sub_title: VP/Director Global Marketing & eCommerce | Digital Transformation | Board Member
summary:
Hey there! Dive into my 15+ rollercoaster in Retail and e-commerce, surfing through the dynamic worlds of fashion, beauty, and an array of consumer goods. From start-ups to iconic brands, I've tailored strategies, crunched numbers, and led teams with a zest unique to both. A Big Apple native and an Amsterdam dweller.

🔥 Here's how I can supercharge your journey:

🎯 Craft bespoke organizational structures and teams, understanding that no two dreams are the same.
🚀 Elevate leadership, mentorship, and communication for an invigorated, motivated team.
🖥️ Construct or renovate your digital backbone, igniting a digital revolution organization-wide.
🌍 Design and deploy global marketing strategies that strike a harmonious chord between customers, brands, and growth.
📈 Optimize the entire marketing funnel, seamlessly intertwining brand and performance tactics.
🌆 Masterfully navigate GTM strategies across diverse terrains.
🎥 Curate compelling brand content, harnessing synergies across all teams.
🔗 Command Digital Marketing across US and Global Markets (EU, UK): Think Email, SEO/SEM, Social Media, and more!
💼 Crunch, analyze, and strategize with numbers—from P/L, budgeting to forecasting.
🛒 Architect global eCommerce & MarTech blueprints, both for the sprints and marathons ahead.
🎨 Offer expertise in Design, Usability, and Testing.
💬 Forge game-changing strategies in Global Customer Service.
🤝 Handpick, hire, and harmonize with the best Digital, Creative, and Web agencies and partners.
⚙️ Champion Project Management, Process Creation, and Change Management.

Consider me your go-to problem-solver, always ready to pivot and adapt.

profile_positions.description:
Anora is a leading wine and spirits brand house in the Nordic region and a global industry forerunner in sustainability. The market-leading portfolio consists of their own iconic Nordic brands and a wide range of prominent international partner wines and spirits. Anora exports to over 30 markets globally. Anora Group also includes Anora Industrial and logistics company Vectura.

Anora is a market leader in the profitable and stable Nordic wine and spirits industry. In 2021, Anora’s pro forma net sales were EUR 665 million. Anora shares are listed on Nasdaq Helsinki under the ticker ANORA.

Responsible for Digital Transformation focusing on operations, developing Amazon business, Nordicspirits.com, and building Global Brand Digital Strategies across different markets and spirits categories.
profile_positions.title: International eCommerce & Brand Director, Spirits

profile_positions.description:
Catena is a high-quality online lead generation company within iGaming and Financial Services. With record breaking retention rates of over 5 million monthly users. 
With a wide and solid platform Catena creates high-quality online leads to customers using their marketing tools and creating substantive content. 
Catena Media is a publicly listed media company. The company was founded in 2012 and employs 500 people in Malta, the United Kingdom, Serbia, Italy, Germany, Sweden, the US, Australia and Japan
profile_positions.title: Non Executive Board Member

profile_positions.description:
We grow companies.

Our Collective solves challenges across business, brand, product, executive recruiting, and technology. We have developed a flat, flexible, and efficient model that allows us to support our clients by providing top-down leadership that drives change and accelerates growth, subject matter experts that can execute challenging tasks, and the ability to find and help build top tier, in-house teams, through our network.

We believe our approach is the future of work. We have reinvented the traditional company by removing traditional hierarchies, unnecessary costs, and a business model that breeds inflexibility. Our approach attracts multi-disciplinary leaders and entrepreneurial free thinkers that self-manage and solve meaningful challenges for our clients. The approach that sparked our company will revolutionize yours.

As a Chameleon, I focus on interim VP or Director of eCommerce, Digital Marketing, Brand Marketing, Performance Marketing, and eCommerce Operation roles for our clients.

Clients include: Polaroid, Interim VP of Digital, Atelier Munro, Advisor
profile_positions.title: Advisor/ Interim VP Global eCommerce & Digital Marketing

profile_positions.description:
My focus was on building a foundation, strategy, and team structure for long-term growth
•	Developed a comprehensive digital strategy, eCommerce roadmap, and detailed calendar to support sales goals, including email, media, SEO, ratings and reviews, website optimizations for key markets (EU, North America, UK) 
•	Launched loyalty program, beauty advisor program, and UK website (Shopify) as well as redefined product architecture and navigation for an easier shopping experience. 
•	Consolidated all media into one partner agency to align all digital media performance for improved optimizations. Defined strategy for all three markets, with all different strategies based on brand awareness in each market. Focused on paid search, paid social, display, and programmatic, aligning with organic social, PR, and paid influencers.
•	Optimized email acquisition/retention efforts through the email service provider, Klavyio, including segmentation and auto-flows and list hygiene to improve email deliverability and performance.
profile_positions.title: Interim Digital Director

profile_positions.description: Developed a digital and content strategy, managed the D2C eCommerce team on day-to-day operations, helped define processes, and partner with the leadership team to determine the future digital team structure within a new Integrated Marketing group. Led media strategy and managed external agencies.
profile_positions.title: Interim VP of Digital

profile_positions.description:
Lead the eCommerce and digital marketing and brand strategies and day-to-day eCommerce operations for US and Global eCommerce businesses. Report to CEO and part of Leadership team. 

Responsibilities include P/L development and management, growing channel revenue, content strategy and development, digital media strategy and management, selection and management of agencies and partners, site management and website re-launches, planning and forecasting, improving customer experience and managing and developing eCommerce, customer service and creative teams. 

- Co-lead a Global re-brand with goals to identify target audience, develop new visual identity and voice, develop and oversee media strategy and brand re-launch. 

- Developed a short and long-term roadmap for US and Global, addressing health of brand, dependency on discounts, marketing and eCommerce technologies, operations and overall marketing strategy.

- Reduced dependency of discounts and optimized digital campaigns, email segmentation, streamlined marketing technology partners, implementing an “always-on” media strategy.

- Led multi-phase redesign and rebuild on the Adobe Magento 2 Platform which included multiple integrations for US, Germany and Global (Rest of world) sites.

- Developed content strategy and oversaw production of over 300 new unique assets including product, model and lifestyle images, videos, new brand copy, and media campaign assets.

- Analyzed and assessed the need for improved customer service, grew customer service team. 

- Established and managed creative team within US organization to support online and retailer creative needs.

- Streamlined process for Global eCommerce operations across International business units, managing overseas 3PL and Global Operations partners
profile_positions.title: VP, Global eCommerce & Digital Marketing

profile_positions.location: New York, New York, Amsterdam Area, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
Specializing in eCommerce growth and profitability strategies, website strategy and development, content strategy, planning, forecasting, business management, team structuring, change management and marketing and media strategy and planning. 

Clients have included: StriVectin, Coronet (New York City)

Services include: 
eCommerce business launch, eCommerce and digital media assessment, customer and website analysis, business and financial analysis and benchmarking, P&L and KPI benchmarking, online competitive analysis, online market sizing, agency and vendor selections for eCommerce platform and digital marketing agencies, web design, digital marketing and social media, customer service and fulfillment operations and partners.
profile_positions.title: eCommerce and Marketing Consultant | VP eCommerce | Digital Strategy

profile_positions.description:
Led the eCommerce and digital marketing strategy, day-to-day eCommerce operations, and 3rd party e-retailers. Responsibilities included growing channel revenue, selection and management of agencies and partners, site management and website re-launch, building processes, improving customer experience and developing the eCommerce team.

- Developed and manage direct to consumer P&L to meet sales and profit targets

- Oversaw the day-to-day eCommerce operations, demand planning, consumer incentives, maintenance, and performance measurement of Strivectin.com

- Oversaw and led full site rebuild on Magento: vendor selection on creative, development, marketing agencies and third-party partners to support the overall website strategy (replenishment, ratings, and reviews, social curations, sampling and loyalty program, SEO and analytics). Winner: Interactive Media Awards – Best in Class

- Analyzed and assessed the need for improved customer service. Led a full customer service partner transition from a direct selling call center to an eCommerce specialized customer service.

- Developed all KPI dashboards, calendars, promotional planning tools and implemented project management tools and processes for cross-functional departments
profile_positions.title: Vice President, eCommerce & Digital Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Established and executed eCommerce and online strategy. Developed strategic marketing and promotional plans, forecasts and budgets to grow revenue and to balance acquisition and retention. Developed and managed web P&L to meet sales and target goals. Oversaw digital marketing agencies and third party service providers to ensure high levels of service were  provided within agreed strategy and operating budgets. Developed eCommerce team. 

Oversaw every aspect of the La Prairie website, ensuring:
- High-quality online shopping experience was supported by appropriate functionality and accurate web merchandising, content management and inventory management
- A look and feel that captured La Prairie brand values

Represented the North America region as a key player on the global Digital team to ensure:
- Launch of new eCommerce website on Demandware met regional requirements
- High-quality online shopping experience supported by appropriate functionality and accurate
merchandising, content management and inventory management

Oversaw fulfillment and customer service operations, leading the transition from our in-house warehouse to outside fulfillment and customer service partner. Developed business rules and guidelines to roll out to global regions.
profile_positions.title: Director of eCommerce & Digital Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Developed and implemented the eCommerce and digital strategy ensuring that it fully exploited the potential of the Ippolita brand. Recruited and managed agencies, led eCommerce and Customer Service team. Developed and managed the web P&L to meet sales and profit targets

Managed every aspect of the website, ensuring:
-  High-quality online shopping experience was supported by appropriate functionality and accurate web merchandising, content management and inventory management
- A look and feel that captured Ippolita brand values and was consistent with print campaigns and supported the wider business
- Led site re-platform on Magento with 800 SKUs and all new brand content

Developed and implemented the digital marketing plan, to:
- Balance acquisition and retention to significantly increase active shopper numbers while maximizing the value of the existing customer base 
- Developed and implemented Social Media Strategy to increase qualified social media following and engagement
- Monitored spend and effectiveness to optimize marketing spend
profile_positions.title: Director of eCommerce & Digital Marketing
